VIII.iv.8.C.1.b
.
Severe Post-operative Residuals for Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.30
Under
38 CFR 4.30(a)(2)
, severe postoperative residuals include but are not limited to
incompletely healed surgical wounds
stumps of recent amputations
therapeutic immobilization of one major joint or more
application of a body cast
the necessity for house confinement, or
the necessity for continued use of a wheelchair or crutches (regular weight-bearing prohibited).
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section C - Convalescent Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.30
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section C
